name: Y'golonac
text:
...So, you wish to see the 'me' of old?
What a handful you are.

name: Y'golonac
text:
You say such things only because you have no idea...
Just how much 'I' have struggled to suppress the
cravings surging within me while 'I' was by your side.

name: Y'golonac
text:
'I' have always wished to leave my mark on your feet, your thighs,
your hands, your upper arms, and the nape of your neck.

name: Y'golonac
text:
So run, while you still can. Because, once your desire for 'me' swell up,
'I' would be dying to know just how much you'd fall apart.

Y'golonac places the mouth on his palm against [Player]'s cheek,
and then lets it crawl down their neck, tracing it.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...What, you really thought you'd had a choice?
Now, go mad for 'me', and show me your bottomless desire!

It felt as if a cracking sound have occured somewhere.
[Player]'s body begins to take on an uncontrollable heat.

name: Y'golonac
text:
...I see, [Player].
So you can make a face like that.

name: Y'golonac
text:
Fret not, there is a way for you to return to normal for all I know.
But for now, on this night, let us love each other to the limit of desire—

The lantern gently floating on the water.
The wish entrusted to its light, was a pure and precious 'desire'.

Y'golonac feels a premonition in the warmth in his chest,
that the wish might come true sooner than expected.

No one knows what the future holds for the two of them.
Under the holy night, 'dreams' appear and vanish, just like champagne bubbles—
